taxonomy: Watches/Men/Timex Digital Green Dial Men's Watch - T53151
review: The ordering and delivery from Amazon was really smooth. I bought this for my brother and had it gift wrapped and for some reason, Amazon decided to waive charges for gift wrapping - awesome!
About the watch:
Pros & features I liked:
1. Light weight
2. Display is very clear and legible even in bright sunlight
3. Indiglo brightens up the display sufficiently to read in dark
4. 30 lap stopwatch. The start/split timer is located prominently and is easy to press when running and without having to look at the watch
5. Easy to store/delete the workout timings
6. Timer with repeat option
7. Optional hourly chimes
Cons:
1. The strap seems a bit long. People with thin wrists may have to get a couple of additional holes punched to get a snug fit
2. Only a single alarm and a single timer is available
3. Apart from the Start/Split and Indiglo buttons, the other 3 buttons have a bit less travel. This makes you want to (sometimes) double check to make sure you have pressed those buttons
Conclusion: If you are looking for a basic sports watch within Rs. 1500, this is probably the best bet and worth the money
a good product from Timex for all the outdoor activities .
cons:
the dial is really small for a slightly big wrist .
I appreciate the prompt delivery from amazon.
Truly amazing product, delivery on time, I use it for under water swimming to till 20M, Value for money product
Good product
Good.
name: Timex Digital Green Dial Men's Watch - T53151
